statements: UPDATE research_publications_metadata SET doi='10.12345/example1' WHERE publication_id=1;
UPDATE research_publications_metadata SET authors=ARRAY['Jane Doe', 'John Smith'] WHERE publication_id=2;
UPDATE research_publications_metadata SET title = 'New Title', publication_date = '2022-01-15', authors = ARRAY['Author A', 'Author B'] WHERE publication_id = 1;
UPDATE research_publications_metadata SET journal_name = 'New Journal', doi = '10.1234/abcd' WHERE publication_id = 2;
UPDATE research_publications SET publication_title='New Title' WHERE publication_id=1;
UPDATE publication_metadata SET metadata_value='Updated Value' WHERE metadata_id=2;
UPDATE research_publications SET publication_title = 'New Title', publication_date = '2021-06-30' WHERE publication_id = 1;
UPDATE publication_metadata SET metadata_value = 'Updated Value' WHERE metadata_key = 'Author' AND publication_id = 1;
UPDATE ResearchPublications SET title='New Title', authors='John Doe' WHERE publication_id=1;
UPDATE PublicationKeywords SET keyword='Database' WHERE keyword_id=1;
UPDATE ResearchPublications SET title='New Title', authors='John Doe, Jane Smith', publication_date='2021-10-15', journal='Science Journal' WHERE publication_id=1
UPDATE PublicationKeywords SET keyword='Machine Learning' WHERE publication_id=1

UPDATE research_publications SET title = 'Machine Learning Algorithms', authors = 'John Doe, Jane Smith', publication_date = '2022-10-15', abstract = 'This paper discusses various machine learning algorithms.', journal = 'Machine Learning Journal', doi = '10.1001/mlj.2022.001' WHERE publication_id = 1;
UPDATE research_publications SET authors = 'Alice Johnson, Bob Brown', journal = 'Data Science Journal' WHERE publication_id = 2;

UPDATE research_publications SET title = 'New Title', authors = 'John Doe, Jane Smith', publication_date = '2022-05-15', abstract = 'Updated abstract', journal = 'Science Journal' WHERE publication_id = 1;
UPDATE publication_metadata SET keyword_id = 2, author_id = 3 WHERE publication_id = 2;
UPDATE research_publications SET authors = ARRAY['John Doe', 'Jane Smith'] WHERE publication_id = 1;
UPDATE research_publications SET title = 'New Title', publication_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE publication_id = 2;
UPDATE research_publications SET title='New Title 1', authors=['Author A', 'Author B'], publication_date='2022-10-01', abstract='Updated Abstract 1' WHERE publication_id=1;
UPDATE research_publications SET abstract='Updated Abstract 2', publication_date='2023-01-15', title='New Title 2', authors=['Author C', 'Author D'] WHERE publication_id=2;
